lead_paragraph: Christina Kim’s second-round 68 at the L.P.G.A. State Farm Classic in Springfield, Ill., included a birdie putt on her last hole that gave her a one-stroke lead over Michelle Wie, who shot a 65 that put her at 12 under.
snippet: Christina Kim’s second-round 68 at the L.P.G.A. State Farm Classic in Springfield, Ill., included a birdie putt on her last hole that gave her a one-stroke lead over Michelle Wie, who shot a 65 that put her at 12 under.
